WASD Revolution!

Use the WASD keys to play the directions of the arrows corresponds to the direction arrows are pointing.

Remake of the original Dance Dance Revolution.

You have depleted enemy's HP, You Won!
WASD Revolution
Hp: 100
Score: 0
Enemy's Health: 300

Directions

  • -Play using the WASD Keys which acts as directional keys
  • -Tap the corresponding key as the moving arrows reach static arrows
  • -A score will be displayed of total scores recieved.
  • -Enemy's Hp will start at 300 each time you score enemy's HP will be deducted and when enemy HP is 0 you win!
  • -Each missed note you will lose Health and game is over when you reach 0
